content: Altmışlık sayı sistemi Babil devletinde uygulandı, bunun sonucunda bir saatte 60 dakika ve günde 24 saat var.
translations: eng:A sexagesimal system was used in Babylonia. Therefore an hour has sixty minutes and a day has twenty-four hours
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Ivanovb (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
